TEXT.S: James Anderson hya'ga NBA pgnaw' mari' misuw qaniy, qutux sa p'agal tins' tay suruw. kawas tay 1989, ryax sa tay 25 nqu tay 3, James Anderson, squliq na p'unro. James Andersonhya'ga NBA pgnaw' mari' misuw qaniy, p'agal tins' pinqbaqan nya James Anderson t'aring kawas tay 2006 tehuk kawas tay 2007, mqwas biru sa Junction City pqwsan biru seneng. James Anderson, t'aring kawas tay 2007 tehuk kawas tay 2010, mqwas biru sa Oklahoma State pqwsan biru krahu.
